Student Directory Staff Directory University of Essex homepage Alexandros Voudouris People Dr Alexandros Voudouris Senior Lecturer School of Computer Science and Electronic Engineering (CSEE) Email alexandros.voudouris@essex.ac.uk Location 1NW.3.9, Colchester Campus Academic support hours Autumn Term: Tuesday 11-1; Please email me first to arrange a meeting. Profile Research Teaching and supervision Publications Grants and funding Contact Profile Research Teaching and supervision Publications Grants and funding Contact Profile Biography I am a Senior Lecturer (Associate Professor) at the School of Computer Science and Electronic Engineering (CSEE), University of Essex, UK. Prior to this, I was a Lecturer (Assistant Professor) at the same institution (April 2020 - September 2023) and a postdoctoral researcher at the Department of Computer Science, University of Oxford (October 2018 - March 2020). I obtained my PhD in computer science in September 2018 from the University of Patras, Greece. My research interests lie at the intersection of theoretical computer science, artificial intelligence, and microeconomic theory. I am highly interested in the design and analysis of simple algorithms for fundamental problems in algorithmic game theory and computational social choice. For more information about me, please visit my personal page here.
